title: Geometric Distribution Calculator – PMF, CDF, Mean & Variance

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Parameterization 1 (trial of first success): \( P(X = k) = (1 - p)^{k - 1} \, p \quad \text{for } k = 1, 2, 3, \dots \) \( F(k) = P(X \le k) = 1 - (1 - p)^k \) \( \mathbb{E}[X] = \frac{1}{p}, \quad \mathrm{Var}(X) = \frac{1 - p}{p^2} \) Parameterization 2 (failures before first success): \( P(Y = x) = (1 - p)^x \, p \quad \text{for } x = 0, 1, 2, \dots \) \( F(x) = P(Y \le x) = 1 - (1 - p)^{x+1} \) \( \mathbb{E}[Y] = \frac{1 - p}{p}, \quad \mathrm{Var}(Y) = \frac{1 - p}{p^2} \)
